sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shui 水 , water ③ . Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 5: 診其脈，心脈滑甚為善渴。 其久病變，或發癰疽，或成水疾 , “If upon examination of the [movements in the] vessels one finds a very smooth [movement] in the heart vessels, and [patients] long for something to drink. After an extended period of time the disease undergoes a change. It may bring forth obstruction- and impediment-illnesses, or it may develop into a water ailment ”.
